title: Delegates
creator_credit: Derek Hart and Derek Hart Productions
brief_description: Shows Red Cross delegates in action in Lebanon. The role of the delegates is clearly portrayed as they visit families to discover their needs and distribute aid, act as mediators in tricky and often dangerous situations and to generally bring about peace and reduce human suffering
